properties.title: Indulge Experimental Bistro
properties.description: Indulge Experimental Bistro is consistently ranked among the World‚Äôs 50 Best Bars and remains a top-five favorite in Asia‚Äôs 50 Best. Its tea-infused cocktail captures the essence of its subtropical flavors. The chef has meticulously gathered representative ingredients from all over Taiwan to create unique small plates designed to complement the drinks. The staff expertly introduces patrons to the local ingredients, explaining how the chef aims to inspire clients with the vivid imagery of Formosa.
properties.address: No. 11, Lane 219, Section 1, Fuxing S Rd, Da‚Äôan District, Taipei City, 106

item3.description: Taiwanese gnocchi, also commonly known as 'cloud soft' owes its name to its texture. The inspiration comes from the early morning in the mountains, when the sun rises, and the sky gradually reveals a ruby-like hue between the sea of clouds and the forest. The red onion noodle dumplings represent the sea of clouds, while the chicken fat transformed into powder and tea tree mushrooms represent the mountains and forests. The spicy tomato-braised pork belly with turmeric and Buddha's hand citron pickled daikon represents the various displays of light. This also symbolizes the enticingly diverse flavors!
item3.name: Gnocchi¬∑Duroc Pork¬∑Spicy Tomato¬∑Mushroom

item4.description: Taking a dish we are all too familiar with - Teppan tofu - as a point of discovery, we mix pure shrimp paste into the egg tofu mixture for reshaping, first baking then frying it. It is then combined with the sweetness of caramelized onions, the spiciness of pepper, the sourness of pickled salmon roe in black vinegar, and the freshness of fermented chili, presenting a novel appearance of Taiwanese-style Western cuisine.
item4.name: Egg Tofu¬∑Scallop¬∑Salmon-roll¬∑Fermented Chili

properties.title: Fubon Art Museum
properties.description: The CEO of Fubon Art Foundation, Maggie Weng, has been preparing for this museum for 10 years. She invited Renzo Piano to design the building, and the theme of this building is ‚Äúlight.‚Äù This 10,000 square meter museum is the first work of Renzo Piano in Taiwan and the first museum in the Xinyi district. The three glass curtain walls of the ‚ÄúWater Exhibition Hall‚Äù on the first floor and the skylight designs of the ‚ÄúSun Gallery‚Äù and ‚ÄúStar Gallery‚Äù on the third floor ingeniously infuse the space with nature, achieving harmony with the environment.  Although the first floor exhibition area is rough, using low-resolution printed wallpaper for the artworks, the third floor is a true modern art museum, offering perfect spatial planning for audiences to immerse themselves in the artworks.
properties.address: No. 79, Songgao Rd., Xinyi Dist., Taipei City, 110

item1.description:
May 04 - Sep 23, 2024
The Fubon Art Museum is honored to present its landmark debut inaugural exhibition, 'True Nature: Rodin and the Age of Impressionism,' during the lively spring season of 2024. This extraordinary showcase not only features the awe-inspiring sculptures, both monumental and intimate, by Rodin himself, but also presents a collection of Impressionist paintings from his contemporaries.
item1.name: True Nature: Rodin and the Age of Impressionism

properties.description: Bar Mood, one of Taiwan‚Äôs first craft cocktail bars, opened in Taipei in 2017. Owner Nick Wu‚Äôs bartop garden features locally foraged garnishes, highlighting Taiwan‚Äôs biodiversity. Using ingredients like oolong tea and soy milk, Wu blends traditional and modern techniques, earning Bar Mood a spot on Asia‚Äôs 50 Best Bars list.
